source:
%%pyspark

denmark_medicine_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/denmark_medicine.parquet/"
norway_medicine_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/norway_medicine.parquet/"
sweden_medicine_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/sweden_medicine.parquet/"

cause_of_death_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/cause_of_death.parquet/"
population_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/population.parquet/"
diabetes_prevalence_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/diabetes_prevalence.parquet"
atc_name_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/atc_name.parquet"

%%pyspark

df_denmark_medicine = spark.read.parquet(denmark_medicine_path)
df_norway_medicine = spark.read.parquet(norway_medicine_path)
df_sweden_medicine = spark.read.parquet(sweden_medicine_path)

df_cause_of_death = spark.read.parquet(cause_of_death_path)
df_population = spark.read.parquet(population_path)
df_diabetes_prevalence = spark.read.parquet(diabetes_prevalence_path)
df_atc_name = spark.read.parquet(atc_name_path)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dim_medicine;

CREATE TABLE dim_medicine AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    s.atc_level_5,
    n5.atc_name AS atc_level_5_name,
    SUBSTRING(s.atc_level_5, 1, 5) AS atc_level_4,
    n4.atc_name AS atc_level_4_name,
    SUBSTRING(s.atc_level_5, 1, 3) AS atc_level_3,
    n3.atc_name AS atc_level_3_name
FROM 
    sweden_medicine s 
LEFT JOIN atc_name n5 ON n5.atc_code = s.atc_level_5  
LEFT JOIN atc_name n4 ON n4.atc_code = SUBSTRING(s.atc_level_5, 1, 5)
LEFT JOIN atc_name n3 ON n3.atc_code = SUBSTRING(s.atc_level_5, 1, 3);

SELECT * FROM dim_medicine;
